email as String = HOST.GetValue(&quot;Email&quot;)
if (Not String.IsNullOrEmpty(email)) then
   Dim user =  TargetDirectory.GetUserByEmailAddress(email)
   if(user IsNot Nothing) then
        Return user
    end if
end if

Dim targetDirectoryId as String = HOST.GetTargetDirectoryId()
if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(targetDirectoryId)) then
	Return TargetDirectory.GetUserByDisplayIdentifier(HOST.GetSystemName())
else
	Return TargetDirectory.GetUserByDisplayIdentifier(targetDirectoryId)
end if</Script><Entity>User</Entity><TargetDirectory>AAD</TargetDirectory><LibraryMinVersion>2.0</LibraryMinVersion></SecurityScriptMapping><SecurityScriptMapping><Script>Dim email as String = HOST.GetValue(&quot;Email&quot;)
if (Not String.IsNullOrEmpty(email)) then
   Dim user =  TargetDirectory.GetUserByEmailAddress(email)
   if(user IsNot Nothing) then
        Return user
    end if
end if

Dim targetDirectoryId as String = HOST.GetTargetDirectoryId()
if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(targetDirectoryId)) then
	Return TargetDirectory.GetUserByDisplayIdentifier(HOST.GetSystemName())
else
	Return TargetDirectory.GetUserByDisplayIdentifier(targetDirectoryId)
end if</Script><Entity>User</Entity><TargetDirectory>AD</TargetDirectory><LibraryMinVersion>2.0</LibraryMinVersion></SecurityScriptMapping></DefaultSecurityScripts><AuthorEditable>false</AuthorEditable><TitleEditable>false</TitleEditable><URLEditable>false</URLEditable><ExtensionEditable>false</ExtensionEditable><ContainerURLEditable>false</ContainerURLEditable></DescribeResult></DescribeResponse></soap:Body></soap:Envelope>
